reasoning: THE DECISIVE TURN. Shadow Network petition (PETITION_013) completes as a free action for 10 VP - I control all three 1-slot courtiers: COURT_006 (promoted Captain Thorne), COURT_010 (Master Scholar Lyra, 1/1), COURT_014 (The Fence, 1/1). This swings me from trailing P2 by 3 VP (109 vs 112) to LEADING by 7 VP (119 vs 112). Triple-ability deployment maximizes gold generation: Blackbeard +4 gold and Rothwell +3 gold bring reserves to 20 (6 VP conversion potential). Varro's Turn 4 ability deploys 3 FREE cubes to BAR_03 (Training Yard, 2 VP), contesting P3's Barracks district control. Full 13-cube influence pool deployed at 100% efficiency: 1 cube to COURT_001 (Guild Master Aldric) flips control from tied (2-2 with P2) to my 3-2 majority - 6th courtier secured. Remaining 12 cubes flood Palace (completely empty, 3 high-value squares = 10 VP) and Docks expansion (DOC_03 Shipwright = 3 VP). The mathematics are elegant: 10 VP petition + 15 VP district potential + 7 gold generated + 1 courtier flipped = maximum efficiency extraction.
recruitment_rationale: All 7 conspiracy positions filled. No recruitment possible.

actions.effect: Place 3 FREE influence cubes in BAR_03 (Training Yard, 2 VP). Contests P3's Barracks district control. Empty square - guaranteed control.
actions.rationale: Varro's Turn 4 ability deploys 3 FREE cubes to an empty Barracks square. P3 controls BAR_01 (1 inf) and BAR_02 (6 inf) as district controller. This establishes a Barracks beachhead without pool expenditure.

actions.effect: Gain 4 gold (13 -> 17). Zero risk, maximum gold generation among available Turn 3 abilities.
actions.rationale: Blackbeard's economic payload delivers 4 gold at zero exposure risk. Building cycle-end conversion reserves. At 3:1 ratio, every 3 gold = 1 VP.

actions.effect: Gain 3 gold (17 -> 20). Safe generation - avoiding the Turn 4 variant (+5 gold, +1 exposure) to maintain 0 exposure profile.
actions.rationale: Safe economic generation. With 0 exposure, I avoid any scapegoat risk. The +5/+1 variant is suboptimal when VP lead is being established through petitions.

influence_placements.rationale: Single cube flips a tied courtier to my control. 6th courtier secured. Advances Cross-Faction Alliance petition pathway (need COURT_005 + COURT_007). Minimal investment for maximum courtier leverage.
Highest-value Palace square (4 VP). Completely empty - 3 cubes establishes fortress control. Palace is entirely uncontested this cycle. Military faction access via Varro.
Second-highest Palace square (3 VP). Empty, adjacent to PAL_01 creating a fortified Palace cluster. Religious faction via Vane.
Third-highest Palace square (3 VP). Three Palace squares controlled = 10 VP from district alone. Approaches Palace district controller status. Military faction via Varro.
High-value Docks square (3 VP), adjacent to my DOC_02 position (2 cubes). Extends Docks control chain toward district controller status. Maritime faction via Blackbeard.

journal_entry.entry: Cycle 5, Turn 4: THE MATHEMATICAL CRESCENDO. Shadow Network petition completes for 10 VP as a free action - three 1-slot courtiers, each secured through different strategic threads across five cycles of calculated positioning. Captain Thorne (promoted in Cycle 1, permanent infrastructure), Master Scholar Lyra (1 cube in Cycle 5 Turn 1, instant Academic courtier majority), The Fence (persistent Criminal faction investment, maintained across resets). The efficiency ratio is unmatched: 10 VP from minimal cumulative investment. This is the Strategic Mastermind's philosophy crystallized - permanent advantages compound with tactical precision to create petition completion pathways that neither economic hoarding nor aggressive overextension can replicate. The VP deficit against P2 (109 vs 112, trailing by 3) transforms into a 7 VP LEAD (119 vs 112) through a single free action. Triple-ability gold generation (+7 gold, reserves to 20) ensures 6 VP cycle-end conversion. Varro's FREE 3-cube Barracks deployment contests P3's district monopoly. The 12-cube Palace flood captures 3 high-value squares (10 VP) in a completely uncontested district. Guild Master Aldric (COURT_001) flipped from contested 2-2 to controlled 3-2 with a single cube - my 6th courtier. Position analysis: 119 VP (leading), 20 gold (6 VP conversion), 6 courtiers controlled, Palace and Docks dual-district presence, Barracks contested. Three turns remain. The compound advantages of five cycles of calculated precision have reached their mathematical apex. Victory through superior optimization has arrived.
